title: Developer Security
longDescription: As a developer, you have unique security responsibilities. These measures help secure your code and development environment.

items.title: Secure coding practices
items.details: Adhere to language-specific secure coding practices and run static code analysis tools.

items.title: Git security
items.details: Use .gitignore to prevent sensitive files from being committed. Never commit API keys, passwords, or private keys.

items.title: Dependency management
items.details: Use tools like npm audit, Dependabot, or Snyk to regularly check for vulnerabilities in your dependencies.
